text: Val-d'Illiez is a municipality of the district Monthey in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. ==Gallery== File:Val-d'Illiez - juillet 2022.jpg|Val-d'Illiez File:Crosets.jpg|Les Crosets ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * Category:Municipalities in Monthey
